text: Let's begin the strategy sync by outlining our main objectives.
Our primary goal is to launch the v2 platform by October.
That means finalizing backend scaling by August 15th.
Emily will lead backend optimization, focusing on Redis caching.
Meanwhile, the frontend team—led by Arjun—will finalize the new onboarding flow.
QA testing begins in September, handled by an external vendor.
Post-launch, we’ll prioritize feature usage analytics and retention funnels.
By Q1 next year, we aim to have experiment-based personalization rolled out.
